errors.error_description: The instructions include an unnecessary and potentially problematic step to install a specific, old version of Flask. Flask is a dependency of Flask-Security-Too and will be installed automatically with a compatible version.
correction_candidates: Change 'pip install Flask==1.0.0' to 'pip install Flask'.
Move 'pip install Flask==1.0.0' to after the 'pip install -U Flask-Security-Too' command.
Change 'pip install Flask==1.0.0' to 'pip install -U Flask'.
